channel.title: Sundorica Product Feed
channel.description: Product feed for Sundorica's Facebook Catalog.

item.g:title: White Gold Georgette Three Piece
item.g:description: Product Details:Top (Kameez): White Gold Georgette with inner lining | Length: 44 inchesBottom (Pant): White Gold Georgette with inner lining | Length: 39–40 inchesDupatta (Orna): Matching Georgette fabric | Elegant lightweight drapeSizes Available:M = 36–38L = 40–42XXL = 44–46✨ Key Features:Premium White Gold Georgette fabricInner lining for comfort and durabilityElegant and versatile design suitable for parties & festive wearAvailable in multiple body sizes for a perfect fitLightweight, flowy, and easy to style

item.g:title: The Ordinary - Niacinamide
item.g:description: - Reduces the appearance of blemishes and congestion.- Helps to balance sebum production.- Minimizes the look of enlarged pores.- Improves uneven skin tone.-Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% is a lightweight, water-based serum that helps reducethe appearance of blemishes, congestion, and uneven skin tone.It also helps to balance sebum production and minimise the look of enlarged pores.How to UseApply a few drops to the face in the morning and evening after cleansing.Gently massage into the skin until fully absorbed.BenefitsReduces the appearance of blemishes and congestionHelps to balance sebum productionMinimises the look of enlarged poresImproves uneven skin tone

item.g:title: Digital Print Three Piece
item.g:description: stylish and elegant outfit designed with premium fabrics. The kameez is crafted from Dubai Silk, paired with a soft Butter Silk salwar and a 5-hand Cotton dupatta. Available in sizes M (36-38), L (40-42), and XL (44-46). Perfect for both casual and special occasions, offering comfort with a modern look.

item.g:title: Digital Print Lawn Three Piece
item.g:description: Bring elegance and comfort together with our Jomjom Swiss Lawn Three Piece, crafted from high-quality Swiss Lawn fabric. Designed with perfect measurements, this stitched set is ideal for both casual wear and special occasions.Product Details:Kameez: Swiss Lawn, long length (48 inches) for a graceful look.Dupatta: 5 haath in length, light and flowy for effortless styling.Salwar: 2.5 gaza, comfortable and perfectly tailored.

item.g:title: Axis-y Dark Spot Correcting Glow Serum 50ml
item.g:description: Reveal your skin’s natural radiance with the Axis-Y Dark Spot Correcting Glow Serum, expertly formulated to target dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone. This lightweight, fast-absorbing serum combines the power of Niacinamide, Vitamin C, and plant-based ingredients to deliver visible results — leaving your skin brighter, smoother, and glowing with health.Key BenefitsBrightening Formula: Enriched with Niacinamide and Vitamin C to fade dark spots, improve dullness, and promote a more even skin tone.Hydrating & Nourishing: Infused with moisturizing agents that deeply hydrate and nourish your skin, keeping it soft, smooth, and supple.Soothing Care: Contains calming botanical ingredients that help reduce redness, irritation, and inflammation — suitable for even the most sensitive skin.Lightweight Texture: Absorbs quickly without any sticky residue, making it perfect for layering under your moisturizer or sunscreen.How to UseApply a few drops to clean skin, morning and night.Gently massage over the entire face, focusing on areas with dark spots or uneven tone.Follow with your favorite moisturizer or sunscreen.Use consistently for best results.Main IngredientsNiacinamide (Vitamin B3): Helps brighten skin and reduce discoloration.Vitamin C: Boosts radiance and promotes an even complexion.Hyaluronic Acid: Locks in moisture and plumps the skin.Botanical Extracts: Soothe, protect, and nourish for a healthy glow.Suitable ForAll skin types — including sensitive skin.Size50ml

item.g:title: Osufi Serum
item.g:description: Net Weight: 300ml Made in Korea 100% Authentic ProductDiscover the secret to timeless, radiant skin with Osufi Serum, a luxurious Korean skincare essential designed to rejuvenate and nourish your complexion from within. Benefits:Helps prevent visible signs of aging for a youthful appearance.Firms and tightens the skin, minimizing pores and uneven texture.Promotes a smooth, glowing “glass skin” effect.Enhances natural radiance and brightness for a healthy, refreshed look.

item.g:title: Osufi Whitening Body Cream 300gm
item.g:description: Transform your skincare routine with Osufi Lotion, a gentle yet effective formula designed to brighten, smooth, and deeply nourish your skin — without any side effects. Powered by natural ingredients, it helps reduce dark spots, repair damaged skin, and enhance your skin’s natural glow for a radiant, glass-skin effect.Key BenefitsBrightens Skin Tone: Helps visibly lighten and even out skin tone within 4–5 shades, naturally and safely.Glowing Complexion: Improves skin clarity, leaving it luminous and smooth.Acne Defense: Fights acne-causing bacteria to promote clear, healthy skin.Dark Spot Removal: Reduces discoloration on the neck, underarms, and other dark areas.Skin Repair: Restores damaged skin and improves overall texture.Anti-Aging Support: Minimizes the appearance of fine lines and signs of aging.Glass Skin Effect: Promotes a smooth, reflective, and hydrated skin finish.

item.g:title: Natural Clean Care Tomato Peeling gel
item.g:description: Cleanse. Renew. Glow.Unveil naturally radiant skin with the Osufi Exfoliating & Brightening Face Scrub, designed to deeply cleanse, smooth, and rejuvenate your complexion. This advanced formula gently removes dead skin cells, excess oil, and impurities — revealing a fresh, luminous, and youthful glow.Key BenefitsMoisturizing: Keeps your skin hydrated and soft after every use.Exfoliating & Dead Skin Removal: Gently removes dull surface cells to promote a smoother texture.Brightening Care: Enhances skin radiance and evens out tone for a natural glow.Anti-Aging Support: Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and fatigue.Deep Cleansing: Eliminates dirt, oil, and impurities for visibly clearer skin.Sun Tan & Spot Removal: Helps reduce sun tan and fade dark spots over time.How to UseTake an adequate amount of scrub and apply evenly to your face — avoiding the eye and mouth areas.Leave on for 1–2 minutes, then gently massage in circular motions with your fingertips.Rinse thoroughly with warm water.Use once or twice a week for best results.Size: 250g

item.g:title: Osufi Whitening Body Lotion
item.g:description: Nourish. Moisturize. Glow.Experience the essence of natural skincare with Osufi Lotion, crafted from pure, nature-derived ingredients to keep your skin soft, smooth, and radiant. Designed for daily use, this lightweight lotion deeply hydrates, restores moisture balance, and helps maintain your skin’s youthful glow.Key BenefitsNatural Ingredients: Formulated with gentle, nature-based components suitable for all skin types.Deep Hydration: Helps retain moisture to keep your skin hydrated and healthy throughout the day.Smooth & Soft Texture: Improves roughness and dryness for visibly softer, supple skin.Radiant Skin: Promotes a natural glow with consistent daily use.Lightweight Formula: Absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue.

item.g:title: Dubai Silk Three Piece
item.g:description: Experience elegance and sophistication with our Dubai Silk Three Piece Set, crafted with premium quality fabric and exquisite detailing. Perfectly stitched for a flawless fit, this outfit combines luxury with comfort for any special occasion.Product Details:Kameez: Dubai Silk with imported lace, digital design, artificial karchupi, and delicate mirror work across the full body. Long length (45+ inches) with guaranteed color retention.Dupatta: Georgette fabric featuring digital print with elegant lace finishing, 2.5 gaza.Salwar: Pure Bhatar Silk with imported lace work, full length (39/40).Available Sizes: 36, 38, 40, 42, 44, 46.

item.g:title: Hchana Vitamin White Rice Serum
item.g:description: Experience the power of rice-based skincare with Hchana Vitamin White Rice Serum — a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula enriched with natural rice germ extract and essential vitamins. Specially designed to hydrate, brighten, and revitalize your skin, this serum helps restore a youthful glow and improve overall skin texture.Key BenefitsDeep Hydration: Hyaluronic Acid locks in moisture, keeping skin soft and supple.Brightening Care: Rice Germ Extract and Niacinamide help even out skin tone and enhance natural radiance.Anti-Aging Support: Vitamin E and antioxidants reduce fine lines, wrinkles, and signs of fatigue.Lightweight Formula: Absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue — perfect for daily use.Main IngredientsRice Germ Extract – Hydrates and brightens skin, reduces visible signs of aging.Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) – Minimizes redness, improves uneven skin tone, and refines texture.Hyaluronic Acid – Retains skin moisture for a plump, smooth appearance.Vitamin E – Protects against environmental damage while providing deep nourishment.How to UseAfter cleansing, apply 2–3 drops of serum to your fingertips or a cotton pad.Gently massage onto face and neck until fully absorbed.Follow with your moisturizer or sunscreen.Use daily, morning and night, for best results.Why You’ll Love ItKeeps skin hydrated, smooth, and radiant.Reduces dark spots and pigmentation for a brighter complexion.Helps prevent premature aging and promotes skin elasticity.
